name: TinaDeck - 2014 edition
description: That's how Tina beep beeps your daily use of TweetDeck. Some cool stuff like cat jumping out of your screen. No, joking aside, for now it's only changing the style of profile pictures.
additional_info: // I RECOMMEND YOU TO STOP USING THIS USERSTYLE BECAUSE IT'S OUTDATED, PLEASE CONSIDER CHECKING THE 2015 EDITION NOW // Git build v1.0 // May 26 2015 Code optimizations, github page released check it out here https://github.com/Shookaite/TinaDeck Beta build v0.5 // May 18 2015 - Hidden the "xx new tweets" feature from the recent tweetdeck update - Changed columns margin & padding - Changed font Beta build v0.4 // March 11, 2015 - Fixed avatar background in account selection >>> Beta build v0.4.1 >>> - Minor esthetic changes >>> Beta build v0.4.2 >>> - Minor VIP changes Beta build v0.3 // March 11, 2015 - Fixed avatar background in profile preview - Added some custom swag for the profile of the developpers of this script Beta build v0.2 // March 08, 2015 - First public release
